peregrine.io
Interface JobInput

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Closeable, SequenceReader
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseJobInput, BlackholeJobInput, LocalPartitionReader
public interface JobInput
extends SequenceReader

Input for a job which provides a set of key/value pairs.

Method Summary
 void addListener(ChunkStreamListener listener)
          Add a listener so that we can can see which chunks are being read as they are open and closed.
 void addListeners(java.util.List<ChunkStreamListener> listeners)
           
 int count()
          Return the size (number of records as key/value pairs) that this JobInput contains.
